sense.name: Distinguish, sort, or separate out.
sense.commentary: Includes: SIEVE OUT Note: May be metaphorical
sense.examples: The company sieved the job applicants. Sieve out those samples from the bad ones. The customer sieved through the selection.

sense.name: Separate by passing through a straining device.
sense.examples: Sieve the flour before mixing. We should sieve the mud from the dig site.
